root.name: POST()
root.description: Makes a POST request to the server. This is equivalent to submitting the contents of a form on a desktop web browser. You can submit String values or a mix of String and byte[] values. If the request is successful, the method will return true and the reply can be retreived using the read() methods.
root.syntax: POST(file, params, values) POST(file, params, data)

parameter.label: file
parameter.description: String: name of file on server to post to

parameter.label: params
parameter.description: String[]: array of parameter names to pass to server

parameter.label: values
parameter.description: String[]: array of values corresponding to the names in the params array

parameter.label: values
parameter.description: Object[]: array of data corresponding to the names in the params array, elements can be either String or byte[]
